summary: Doc Holliday, the cold-blooded sharp-shooter, reunites with his old friend, Marshall Wyatt Earp, to take down the Clanton gang in the dusty town of Tombstone, in Arizona.
cast: Stacy Keach|Faye Dunaway|Harris Yulin|Michael Witney|Denver John Collins|Dan Greenburg|John Scanlon|Richard McKenzie|John Bottoms|Philip Shafer|Ferdinand Zogbaum|Penelope Allen|Hedy Sontag|James Greene|Antonia Rey|Marshall Efron|Fred Dennis|Bruce M. Fischer|Gene Collins|Vivian Allen|Florencio Amarilla|Luis Barboo|Per Barclay|Henri Bidon|Sharon Fruitin|Mart Hulswit|Gene Reyes|Lucy Tiller|Juan Manuel Torres|Dan van Husen
title: Duelo a muerte en OK Corral
